```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```


Importing data
```{r}
chick_fil_a_data <- read_csv("/Users/lucasberth/Documents/Coding Docs/DSAA---Project/chick-fil-a-nutrition.csv")
```


Looking/Examining Data
```{r}
head(chick_fil_a_data)
```


Question #1 - Determine top 5 protein items on the menu
```{r}
top5size <- chick_fil_a_data%>%
  select(Menu, `Protein (G)`, `Serving size`)%>%
  arrange(desc(`Protein (G)`))%>%
  slice(1:5)
top5size
```


Question #2 - Determine top 5 calorie items on the menu
```{r}
chick_fil_a_data %>%
  select(Menu, Calories, `Protein (G)`) %>%
  arrange(desc(Calories)) %>%
  slice(1:5)
```


Simple Regression
```{r}
model1 <- lm(`Protein (G)` ~ Calories, data=chick_fil_a_data)
summary(model1)
```


Graphing the Simple Regression
```{r}
model1 %>%
  ggplot(aes(`Protein (G)`, Calories)) +
  geom_point()
```
